nodes.text: Capital Security was the law enforcement agency of the Imperial Remnant capital planet of Bastion. In 19 ABY, Capital Security was alerted by Major Grodin Tierce that New Republic operatives were in the city. Two security officers spotted the operatives, identified as former generals Han Solo and Lando Calrissian. However, Calrissian fired his blaster into the ceiling, causing a commotion in the restaurant and inducing the crowd to panic. The two officers attempted to locate him but were disabled by Solo.
